MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH64 postcode area of Neston, affecting properties in Dunstan Lane, Burton Hay and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:47AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:21AM on 15th February 2021
